meanings.sent1: The cabling of the new internet connection was done efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The cabling in the building needed to be replaced due to wear and tear.
meanings.sent3: The cabling job was so well done that even the walls seemed impressed.
meanings.sent4: The cabling snaked through the house like a helpful, invisible friend.
meanings.sent5: The intricate cabling work resembled a complex spider web, connecting everything together.

meanings.definition: A system of cables used for communication or electrical purposes.
meanings.sent1: The cabling in the office allowed for seamless communication between departments.
meanings.sent2: The cabling for the sound system was neatly organized behind the stage.
meanings.sent3: The cabling system played a game of tug-of-war with the electrician.
meanings.sent4: The cabling network formed a web of connectivity throughout the entire building.
meanings.sent5: The cabling layout resembled a roadmap, guiding the flow of information smoothly.
